src: The objective of this work was to determine whether there is a difference in health-related quality of life (HRQoL) of patients with non-small cell lung cancer - compared to the German normal population - before and after surgery.
tgt: Ziel dieser Arbeit war es, festzustellen, ob es einen Unterschied in der gesundheitsbezogenen Lebensqualität (HRQoL) von Patienten mit nicht-kleinzelligem Lungenkarzinom - im Vergleich zur deutschen Normalbevölkerung - vor und nach der Operation gibt.
ref: Ziel dieser Arbeit war es, festzustellen, ob es einen Unterschied in der gesundheitsbezogenen Lebensqualität (HRQoL) von Patienten mit nicht-kleinzelligem Lungenkrebs – im Vergleich zur deutschen Normalbevölkerung – vor und nach der Operation gibt.

Ziel dieser Arbeit war es, festzustellen, ob es einen Unterschied in der gesundheitsbezogenen Lebensqualität (HRQoL) von Patienten mit nicht-kleinzelligem Lungenkrebs – im Vergleich zur deutschen Normalbevölkerung – vor und nach der Operation gibt.

src: T1 and T2 mapping may not only enable noninvasive recognition of cardiac involvement in patients with systemic sarcoidosis but may also serve as a marker for early cardiac involvement of the disease allowing for timely treatment.

ref: Das T1- und T2-Mapping ermöglicht möglicherweise nicht nur die nichtinvasive Erkennung einer kardialen Beteiligung bei Patienten mit systemischer Sarkoidose, sondern kann auch als Marker für eine frühe kardiale Beteiligung der Krankheit dienen, was eine rechtzeitige Behandlung ermöglicht.

src: To investigate if T1 and T2 mapping is able to differentiate between diseased and healthy myocardium in patients with systemic sarcoidosis, and to compare the standard mapping measurement (measurement within the whole myocardium of the midventricular short axis slice, SAX) to a more standardized method measuring relaxation times within the midventricular septum (ConSept).
tgt: Es sollte untersucht werden, ob das T1- und T2-Mapping in der Lage ist, zwischen erkranktem und gesundem Myokard bei Patienten mit systemischer Sarkoidose zu unterscheiden, und die Standard-Mapping-Messung (Messung innerhalb des gesamten Myokards der mittleren ventrikulren Kurzachsenscheibe, SAX) mit einer standardisierteren Methode zur Messung der Relaxationszeiten innerhalb der mittleren ventrikulren Scheidewand (ConSept) zu vergleichen.
ref: Zu untersuchen, ob T1- und T2-Mapping in der Lage ist, bei Patienten mit systemischer Sarkoidose zwischen erkranktem und gesundem Myokard zu unterscheiden, und die Standard-Mapping-Messung (Messung innerhalb des gesamten Myokards des mittventrikulären Kurzachsenschnitts, SAX) mit einer standardisierteren Methode zu vergleichen, die Relaxationszeiten innerhalb des mittventrikulären Septums (ConSept) misst.

src: The objective of this work was to determine whether there is a difference in health-related quality of life (HRQoL) of patients with non-small cell lung cancer - compared to the German normal population - before and after surgery.
tgt: Ziel dieser Arbeit war es, festzustellen, ob es einen Unterschied in der gesundheitsbezogenen Lebensqualität (HRQoL) von Patienten mit nicht-kleinzelligem Lungenkarzinom - im Vergleich zur deutschen Normalbevölkerung - vor und nach der Operation gibt.
ref: Ziel dieser Arbeit war es, festzustellen, ob es einen Unterschied in der gesundheitsbezogenen Lebensqualität (HRQoL) von Patienten mit nicht-kleinzelligem Lungenkrebs – im Vergleich zur deutschen Normalbevölkerung – vor und nach der Operation gibt.

src: T1 and T2 mapping may not only enable noninvasive recognition of cardiac involvement in patients with systemic sarcoidosis but may also serve as a marker for early cardiac involvement of the disease allowing for timely treatment.
tgt: Das T1- und T2-Mapping kann nicht nur die nichtinvasive Erkennung einer kardialen Beteiligung bei Patienten mit systemischer Sarkoidose ermöglichen, sondern auch als Marker für eine frühe kardiale Beteiligung der Erkrankung dienen und eine rechtzeitige Behandlung ermöglichen.
ref: Das T1- und T2-Mapping ermöglicht möglicherweise nicht nur die nichtinvasive Erkennung einer kardialen Beteiligung bei Patienten mit systemischer Sarkoidose, sondern kann auch als Marker für eine frühe kardiale Beteiligung der Krankheit dienen, was eine rechtzeitige Behandlung ermöglicht.

Das T1- und T2-Mapping ermöglicht möglicherweise nicht nur die nichtinvasive Erkennung einer kardialen Beteiligung bei Patienten mit systemischer Sarkoidose, sondern kann auch als Marker für eine frühe kardiale Beteiligung der Krankheit dienen, was eine rechtzeitige Behandlung ermöglicht.
atomic_facts: ['T1 mapping may enable noninvasive recognition of cardiac involvement in patients with systemic sarcoidosis.', 'T1 mapping may serve as a marker for early cardiac involvement of the disease allowing for timely treatment.', 'T2 mapping may enable noninvasive recognition of cardiac involvement in patients with systemic sarcoidosis.', 'T2 mapping may serve as a marker for early cardiac involvement of the disease allowing for timely treatment.']

src: The age ranged from 24 to 64 years, the burned total body surface area (TBSA) from 3 % to 12.5 %. All three patients required skin grafting and the length of stay in hospital ranged from five to eleven days.

src: The objective of this work was to determine whether there is a difference in health-related quality of life (HRQoL) of patients with non-small cell lung cancer - compared to the German normal population - before and after surgery.

src: However, LGE+ and LGE- patients showed no significant differences in T1 and T2 relaxation times regardless of the measurement approach used (ConSept/SAX) (p > 0.05). Der direkte Vergleich von ConSept- und SAX-T1-Mapping zeigte eine hohe Übereinstimmung in der Unterscheidung zwischen gesundem und erkranktem Myokard (Kappa = 0,844).

src: The objective of this work was to determine whether there is a difference in health-related quality of life (HRQoL) of patients with non-small cell lung cancer - compared to the German normal population - before and after surgery.
tgt: Ziel dieser Arbeit war es, festzustellen, ob es einen Unterschied in der gesundheitsbezogenen Lebensqualität (HRQoL) von Patienten mit nicht-kleinzelligem Lungenkrebs – im Vergleich zur deutschen Normalbevölkerung – vor und nach der Operation gibt.
atomic_facts: ['The objective of this work was to determine if there is a difference in health-related quality of life (HRQoL) of patients with non-small cell lung cancer before surgery.', 'The objective of this work was to determine if there is a difference in health-related quality of life (HRQoL) of patients with non-small cell lung cancer after surgery.', 'The health-related quality of life (HRQoL) of patients with non-small cell lung cancer may differ from the German normal population before surgery.', 'The health-related quality of life (HRQoL) of patients with non-small cell lung cancer may differ from the German normal population after surgery.']
questions: ["Is there a difference in health-related quality of life (HRQoL) of patients with non-small cell lung cancer before surgery?", "Is there a difference in health-related quality of life (HRQoL) of patients with non-small cell lung cancer after surgery?", "Does the health-related quality of life (HRQoL) of patients with non-small cell lung cancer differ from the German normal population before surgery?", "Does the health-related quality of life (HRQoL) of patients with non-small cell lung cancer differ from the German normal population after surgery?"]

src: However, LGE+ and LGE- patients showed no significant differences in T1 and T2 relaxation times regardless of the measurement approach used (ConSept/SAX) (p > 0.05). Direct comparison of ConSept and SAX T1 mapping showed high conformity in the discrimination between healthy and diseased myocardium (Kappa = 0.844).
tgt: Patienten mit LGE+ und LGE- zeigten jedoch unabhängig vom verwendeten Messansatz (ConSept/SAX) (p > 0,05) keine signifikanten Unterschiede in den T1- und T2-Relaxationszeiten. Der direkte Vergleich von ConSept- und SAX-T1-Mapping zeigte eine hohe Übereinstimmung in der Unterscheidung zwischen gesundem und erkranktem Myokard (Kappa = 0,844).
atomic_facts: ['LGE+ patients showed no significant differences in T1 and T2 relaxation times regardless of the measurement approach used (ConSept/SAX) (p > 0.05).', 'LGE- patients showed no significant differences in T1 and T2 relaxation times regardless of the measurement approach used (ConSept/SAX) (p > 0.05).', 'Direct comparison of ConSept and SAX T1 mapping showed high conformity in the discrimination between healthy and diseased myocardium (Kappa = 0.844).']

src: The objective of this work was to determine whether there is a difference in health-related quality of life (HRQoL) of patients with non-small cell lung cancer - compared to the German normal population - before and after surgery.
tgt: Ziel dieser Arbeit war es, festzustellen, ob es einen Unterschied in der gesundheitsbezogenen Lebensqualität (HRQoL) von Patienten mit nicht-kleinzelligem Lungenkrebs – im Vergleich zur deutschen Normalbevölkerung – vor und nach der Operation gibt.

src: T1 and T2 relaxation times were significantly longer in all patients compared with controls using both the SAX and the ConSept approach (p < 0.05).

src: However, LGE+ and LGE- patients showed no significant differences in T1 and T2 relaxation times regardless of the measurement approach used (ConSept/SAX) (p > 0.05). Direct comparison of ConSept and SAX T1 mapping showed high conformity in the discrimination between healthy and diseased myocardium (Kappa = 0.844).
tgt: Patienten mit LGE+ und LGE- zeigten jedoch unabhängig vom verwendeten Messansatz (ConSept/SAX) (p  >  0,05) keine signifikanten Unterschiede in den T1- und T2-Relaxationszeiten. Der direkte Vergleich von ConSept- und SAX-T1-Mapping zeigte eine hohe Übereinstimmung in der Unterscheidung zwischen gesundem und erkranktem Myokard (Kappa  =  0,844).

src: The changes in different organs of those who have died from the new coronavirus COVID-19 infection are stereotyped and include the manifestations of virus-induced action and a systemic inflammatory response with mainly microvasculature alteration, which leads to the development of coagulopathies and, accordingly, to total hypoxia.

src: Almost all post-COVID-19 patients complain of severe fatigue, emotional lability, and sometimes have features of asthenic-neurotic, anxiety-phobic disorders and apato-abulic syndromes, which require rehabilitation measures, as well as courses of restorative neurotrophic and nootropic therapy.

src: The most pronounced lung changes in COVID-19 were determined with a predominance of multiple total bilateral lesions of the lower lobes of the lungs, which was manifested by virus-induced changes in the parenchyma and stroma, as well as by microcirculation disorders.

ref: Наиболее выраженные изменения в легких при COVID-19 определялись с преобладанием множественных общих двусторонних поражений нижних долей легких, что проявлялось вирусноиндуцированными изменениями паренхимы и стромы, а также нарушениями микроциркуляции.

src: This review presents and summarizes the current literature about the use of lithium in treatment of affective disorders, as well as its effects on cellular physiology, with a separate description of the effect of this ion on the functioning of nerve tissue and ion-molecular mechanisms.

src: There are two types of ID : 1) absolute ID (AID), in case of decrease in iron reserves and circulating iron, or 2) functional ID (FID), in case of decrease in circulating iron, while reserves are preserved or increased.
tgt: Il existe deux types d'ID : 1) l'ID absolu (AID), en cas de diminution des réserves de fer et du fer circulant, ou 2) l'ID fonctionnel (FID), en cas de diminution du fer circulant, tandis que les réserves sont préservées ou augmentées.
ref: Il existe deux types de CF : 1) la CF absolue (CFA), en cas de diminution des réserves de fer et du fer circulant, ou 2) la CF fonctionnelle (CFF), en cas de diminution des réserves de fer circulant, alors que les réserves sont préservées ou augmentées.

src: Considering the situation of globally pandemic of COVID-19, to decrease the risk of influenza virus infection and minimize the impact on COVID-19 prevention and control, we recommend the following priority for seasonal influenza vaccination: healthcare workers, including clinical doctors and nurses, public health professionals, quarantine professionals; vulnerable groups living in nursing homes or welfare homes and staffs who take care those vulnerable groups; people work or stay in high population density places, such as teachers and students in kindergartens, primary and secondary school, prisoners and staffs of prisons; other high risk group of influenza, including adults ≥60 years of age, children aged 6-59 months, persons with specific chronic diseases, the family members and caregivers of infants <6 months of age, and pregnant women or women who plan to become pregnant during the influenza season.
tgt: 考虑到COVID-19全球大流行的情况，为了降低流感病毒感染的风险并将对COVID-19防控的影响降至最低，我们建议季节性流感疫苗接种的重点如下：医护人员，包括临床医生和护士，公共卫生专业人员，检疫专业人员；生活在养老院或福利院的弱势群体和照顾这些弱势群体的工作人员；在人口密度高的场所工作或居住的人，如幼儿园、中小学校的教师和学生、服刑人员和监狱工作人员；其他流感高危人群，包括≥60岁的成年人、6-59个月的儿童、患有特定慢性疾病的人、<6个月婴儿的家庭成员和照顾者、孕妇或计划在流感季节怀孕的妇女。
ref: 考虑到全球 COVID-19 大流行的情势，为了降低流感病毒感染的风险，最大限度地减少对 COVID-19 预防和控制的影响，我们建议季节性流感疫苗的优先接种对象如下：医护人员，包括临床医生和护士、公共卫生专业人员、检疫专业人员；生活在养老院或福利院的弱势群体以及照顾这些弱势群体的工作人员；在高人口密度场所工作或停留的人员，如幼儿园、中小学教师和学生、囚犯和监狱工作人员；其他高风险流感群体，包括 60 岁以上的成年人、 6-59 个月的儿童、特定慢性疾病患者、6 个月以下婴儿的家庭成员和照顾者、孕妇及计划在流感季节期间怀孕的女士。

考虑到全球 COVID-19 大流行的情势，为了降低流感病毒感染的风险，最大限度地减少对 COVID-19 预防和控制的影响，我们建议季节性流感疫苗的优先接种对象如下：医护人员，包括临床医生和护士，公共卫生专业人员，检疫专业人员；生活在养老院或福利院的弱势群体以及照顾这些弱势群体的工作人员；在高人口密度场所工作或停留的人员，如幼儿园，中小学的教师和学生，囚犯和监狱工作人员；其他高风险流感群体，包括 60 岁以上的成年人， 6-59 个月的儿童，特定慢性疾病患者， 6 个月以下婴儿的家庭成员和照顾者，孕妇及计划在流感季节期间怀孕的女士。
atomic_facts: ['We recommend the following priority for seasonal influenza vaccination: healthcare workers, including clinical doctors and nurses, public health professionals, quarantine professionals;', 'We recommend the following priority for seasonal influenza vaccination: vulnerable groups living in nursing homes or welfare homes and staffs who take care; people work or stay in high population density places, such as teachers and students in kindergartens, primary and secondary school, prisoners and staffs of prisons;', 'We recommend the following priority for seasonal influenza vaccination: other high risk group of influenza, including adults ≥60 years of age, children aged 6-59 months, persons with specific chronic diseases, the family members and caregivers of infants <6 months of age, and pregnant women or women who plan to become pregnant during the influenza season.']
questions: ["Which groups are recommended for seasonal influenza vaccination according to the text?", "Which groups are considered vulnerable and need priority for seasonal influenza vaccination?", "Which groups are recommended for seasonal influenza vaccination due to being in high population density places?", "Which groups are recommended for seasonal influenza vaccination as they are at high risk from influenza?"]

src: Children aged 6 months through 8 years require 2 doses of influenza vaccine administered a minimum of 4 weeks apart during their first season of vaccination for optimal protection.

ref: 6 个月至 8 岁的儿童需要接种 2 剂流感疫苗，第一剂与第二剂至少间隔 4 周，以获得最佳保护。

src: Influenza viruses can have frequent antigenic variation and changes, which can result in rapid and widespread transmission resulting in annual epidemics and outbreaks in places of public gathering such as schools, kindergartens and nursing homes.

src: Digital prosthodontic technology has brought great changes to the prosthodontic technology in China by improving the quality of prostheses, adding new types of restorations, changing the manufacturing methods of restorations from handmade to computer-aided manufacturing, bringing new operating models of dental laboratories, and promoting the academic status of the prosthodontic technology.
tgt: 数字口腔修复技术通过提高假体质量，增加新型修复体，将修复体的制造方法从手工制作改为计算机辅助制造，为牙科实验室带来新的操作模式，为中国的口腔修复技术带来了巨大变化，并促进口腔修复技术的学术地位。

src: Influenza viruses can have frequent antigenic variation and changes, which can result in rapid and widespread transmission resulting in annual epidemics and outbreaks in places of public gathering such as schools, kindergartens and nursing homes.

src: Considering the situation of globally pandemic of COVID-19, to decrease the risk of influenza virus infection and minimize the impact on COVID-19 prevention and control, we recommend the following priority for seasonal influenza vaccination: healthcare workers, including clinical doctors and nurses, public health professionals, quarantine professionals; vulnerable groups living in nursing homes or welfare homes and staffs who take care those vulnerable groups; people work or stay in high population density places, such as teachers and students in kindergartens, primary and secondary school, prisoners and staffs of prisons; other high risk group of influenza, including adults ≥60 years of age, children aged 6-59 months, persons with specific chronic diseases, the family members and caregivers of infants <6 months of age, and pregnant women or women who plan to become pregnant during the influenza season.
tgt: 考虑到全球 COVID-19 大流行的情势，为了降低流感病毒感染的风险，最大限度地减少对 COVID-19 预防和控制的影响，我们建议季节性流感疫苗的优先接种对象如下：医护人员，包括临床医生和护士、公共卫生专业人员、检疫专业人员；生活在养老院或福利院的弱势群体以及照顾这些弱势群体的工作人员；在高人口密度场所工作或停留的人员，如幼儿园、中小学教师和学生、囚犯和监狱工作人员；其他高风险流感群体，包括 60 岁以上的成年人、 6-59 个月的儿童、特定慢性疾病患者、6 个月以下婴儿的家庭成员和照顾者、孕妇及计划在流感季节期间怀孕的女士。
atomic_facts: ['To decrease the risk of influenza virus infection and minimize the impact on COVID-19 prevention and control, we recommend the following priority for seasonal influenza vaccination: healthcare workers, including clinical doctors and nurses, public health professionals, quarantine professionals.', 'Vulnerable groups living in nursing homes or welfare homes and staffs who take care those vulnerable groups.', 'People work or stay in high population density places, such as teachers and students in kindergartens, primary and secondary school, prisoners and staffs of prisons.', 'Other high risk group of influenza, including adults ≥60 years of age, children aged 6-59 months, persons with specific chronic diseases, the family members and caregivers of infants <6 months of age, and pregnant women or women who plan to become pregnant during the influenza season.']
